title: Have There Been at Least 1.1M Gun Deaths in the US Since John Lennon’s Murder?
subtitle: More than 1.1 million gun-related deaths have occurred in the U.S. since John Lennon was murdered on 8 December 1980.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: There have been more than 1.1 million gun-related deaths in the U.S. since John Lennon was killed on 8 December 1980.
